name: Clogard Smart Plus Toothbrush
description: Clogard smart plus toothbrush has a smoothly curved handle and upward angled bristles allow the user to reach hard-to-reach areas. The 360-degree grip further contributes to an excellent brushing experience whilst the ‘extra protective’ cap protects the section of the brush which is inserted into the mouth. All Clogard toothbrushes use high-quality international DuPont Tynex bristles and are SLS certified to offer a superior brushing experience. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
